metadata.name: Remote File Download Via Findstr.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "findstr" with specific flags and a remote share path. This specific set of CLI flags would allow "findstr" to download the content of the file located on the remote share as described in the LOLBAS entry.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('findstr')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('findstr.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('findstr.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -v ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /v ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –v ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —v ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―v '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―l '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "findstr" with specific flags and a remote share path. This specific set of CLI flags would allow "findstr" to download the content of the file located on the remote share as described in the LOLBAS entry.
